dialog: How old are you now, Scott? Like, 28?
I'm not playing your little games, kids.
So, you've been out of high school for, like, 13 years.
And you're dating a highschool girl.
So, did you guys, like, you know, do it yet?
And we have meaningful conversations about how yearbook club went and about her friends and, you know, drama.
We almost held hands once, but then she got embarrassed.
Well, aren't you pleased as punch.
I don't know what you're talking about.
So, when do we get to meet her?
Oh, please, let it be soon.
Hey, Knives, this is Stephen Stills.
Is she gonna geek out on us?
She'll just sit in the corner, man.
I mean, I want her to geek out on us.
She has the capacity to geek.
Here, let me get your coat.
That's kind of a big question.
Okay, let's start with Launchpad McQuack.
That's not the actual title of the...
Yeah, yeah Yeah, yeah Laminate the stasis Mama, mama serpentine I got a breathalyzer And my body's clean Yeah! Yeah!
Get ready Yeah Yeah, yeah Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah Yeah!
Scott, if your life had a face, I would punch it.
I mean, are you really happy or are you really evil?
Like, do I have ulterior motives or something?
Neil, you were saying about "she seems awesome." Yeah, she seems awesome.
Before you hear some dirty lies from someone else, yes, I'm dating a 17yearold.
Does this mean we have to stop sleeping together?
You see another bed in here?
Yeah. You're totally my bitch forever.
So, the whole 17yearold thing, don't tell too many people.
I mean, don't tell my sister.
Who is this mystery child you date?
We haven't even held hands yet.
I think she hugged me once.
Scott, why are you doing this?
I don't know. It's just nice, you know? It's just simple.
It's been over a year since you got dumped by SheWhoWillNotBeNamed.
Are you legitimately moving on or is this just you being insane?
Can I get back to you on that?
I do not wanna be here at all.
I hate you. Even I would think twice about dating a 17yearold.
Well, she's only allowed out when the sun is up, so I wouldn't call it dating.
That doesn't sound so good, either. No.
This is my cool, gay roommate, Wallace Wells.
Oh, do you wanna know who in my class is gay?
You're too good for him. Run.
Did you know that the original name for PacMan was PuckMan?

You'd think it was because he looks like a hockey puck, but it actually comes from the Japanese phrase "pakupaku," which means, "to flap one's mouth open and closed." They changed it because they thought that "PuckMan" would be too easy to vandalize.
You know, people could just scratch off the "P" and turn it into an "F" or whatever.
Nine, eight, seven, six, five, four, three...
I don't listen to that much music.
I mean, I know a lot of kids who play piano or whatever, but you guys...
Well, I knew I personally rocked, but I never suspected that we rocked as a unit.
I mean, you guys are gonna be huge.
Well, we're already pretty big, but, yeah, I guess it'd be cool if cool people started wearing our Tshirt or whatever.
Excuse me, do you have anything by The Clash at Demonhead?
Have you tried the section marked "The Clash at Demonhead"?
Are you coming to my party Friday, or will you be busy babysitting?
You don't want to listen to her.
And you definitely don't want to listen to them.
Oh, I heart them so much.
Yeah, I hearted them, too, until they signed to a major label, and the lead singer turned into a total bitch and ruined my life forever.
Sorry, you were saying about me?
I mean, I've never gone out with anyone so talented.
Go out with a lot of guys?
I've never even kissed a guy.
So, this is your secret lair?
My secret lair is one of those "No girls allowed"type deals.
But do you wanna see the house where I grew up?
You're just having some idiotic dream.
Does that mean we can make out?
I had this totally weird dream.
We don't use the Eword in this house.
Speaking of new, weren't you supposed to take your fake highschool girlfriend to the library a halfhour ago?
What? It's like 6:00 in the morning.
Libraries remind me of grade school.
That must seem like a really long time ago.
Yeah, let's talk about something else.
You only played one note for that entire song.
I told you, like, We're going to this party, retard.
I thought you guys split up.
We did, but there might be some label guys there, so, you know...
Oh, man, this is gonna suck. Suck!
At least it'll give us something to complain about.
I'm gonna go pee due to boredom.
You know, so I told him you've got a really good sound, and I think that you should market your sound to deaf people, because... Scott! Hey!
You getting your drink on here?
What do you mean, you don't drink?
I distinctly remember you being very drunk off a couple of GandT's...
Hey, Comeau, you know everyone, right?
You know this one girl with hair like this?
Somebody said she was gonna be here tonight, actually.
You have the hots for her or something?
I gotta tell you though, I hear that she's a little hardcore.
Well, PacMan was originally called PuckMan.
Not because PacMan looks like a hockey puck.
"Pakupaku" means "flap your mouth," and that they were afraid people would change...
Scratch out the "P" and turn it into an "F," like...
I'll leave you alone forever now.
Dude! What do you know about Ramona Flowers?
All I know is that she is American.
Why don't you go talk to Sandra and Monique?
What do you know about Ramona Flowers?
I heard she has a boyfriend.
Yeah. Some guy back in New York.
I heard she kicks all kinds of ass.
She has men dying at her feet.
She's got some battle scars, dude.
Didn't you say she just broke up with someone?
They had a huge fight, or whatever.
Yes! But I didn't want Scott to know that, Stephen.
Yeah, I don't know what it is about that girl.
Scott, I forbid you from hitting on Ramona, even if you haven't had a real girlfriend in over a year.
Hey! Whoa, whoa, whoa! Scott's mourning period is officially over.
Dating a highschooler is the mourning period.
I thought you guys broke up.
I don't want you scaring off the coolest girl at my party, Scott.
We all know you're a total ladykiller wannabe, jerkyjerk.
That wasn't what it looked like.
That time you dumped Kim for...
Okay. Me and Kim are all good now, all right?
Whatever! Ramona's out of your league.
Let's just leave it at that.
Besides, I'm not even sure she did have a big breakup.
She keeps mentioning some guy named Gideon.
Yeah, I don't know what it is about that girl.
So, that girl from my dream...
I saw her at the library.
Library. Can I pretend we're talking about a guy?
And then I'm at this party and, hey, there she is.
I think she's the girl of my dreams.
Then you should break up with your fake highschool girlfriend.
I've never been so sure about something.
Then you should break up with your fake highschool girlfriend.
You should break up with your fake highschool girlfriend.
You're thinking of juggling two chicks?
Well, you should break up with your fake highschool girlfriend.
You of all people should know how sucky it is to get cheated on.
Don't you have a job to do?
You're right. I should send out a mass text about this. Bye.
Wallace, how do you do that?
Amazon.ca, what's the website for that?
"Amazon.ca." I have to order something really cool.
Dude, this thing claims I have mail.
It's amazing what we can do with computers these days.
"Dear Mr. Pilgrim, it has come to my attention "that we will be fighting soon.
"My name is Matthew Patel, and..." Blah, blah, blah...
Scott, are you waiting for the package you just ordered?
It's the weekend. It won't ship until Monday at the earliest.
You're supposed to meet me at the bus stop a halfhour ago.
I cannot believe the music they put on while we work.
Hannah broke up with Alan and now she's all into Derek.
But then Tamara claims she has dibs on Derek.
Okay. I'm sorry, that was all me.
I can never get past that guy.
Don't beat yourself up about it.
Do you want to keep going?
The Rockit. And even better, it's the T. I. B. B.
The Toronto International Battle of the Bands?
This guy at work was like, "Steve, you know anybody in a band?" And I was like, "I'm in a band." And he was like, "You're in a band?" And I was like, "Yeah, I am totally in a band." Great story, man.
Is there a prize or something?
Only a record deal with GMan Graves.
If we win, it won't just be Knives wearing Sex BobOmb shirts.
It'll be the cool kids, too.
I promise I will do everything I can to get out of the study group and come.
Oh, my gosh, who are you battling?
That one band with Crash, and those boys?
Oh, my gosh, I hate them, too.
Hi, I was thinking about asking you out, but then I realized how stupid that would be.
So, do you want to go out sometime?
You can just sign for this, all right?
I just woke up, and you were in my dream.
I dreamt that you were delivering me this package. Is that weird?
No, it's just that you have this really convenient subspace highway running through your head that I like to use.
It's, like, three miles in 15 seconds.
I forgot you guys don't have that in Canada.
You don't remember me, do you?
We met at the party the other day.
You know, you need to sign for this, whatever this is.
But if I sign for it, you'll leave.
Okay, well, maybe, do you wanna hang out sometime?
You're the new kid on the block, right?
I've lived here forever, so there are reasons for you to hang out with me.
You want me to hang out with you?
If I say yes, will you sign for your damn package?
Why are you just standing there?
Dude, I'm totally waiting on you.
I'm sorry, I just assumed you were too cool to be here on time.
So, how did you end up in Toronto?
Just needed to escape, I guess.
I got this job here, and Gideon had always said Toronto was one of the great cities, so...
Do you mind if I don't get into that right now?
It's so not interesting to me.
I'm in between jobs at the moment.
Well, my last job was a long story filled with sighs.
Is that why you left New York?
It was just time to head somewhere a little more chilled.
This whole thing is an unmitigated disaster.
I think act of God is a pretty decent excuse for a lousy date.
So this is a date, eh?
I think there's a thingy over here, somewhere.
What kind of tea do you want?

We have blueberry, raspberry, ginseng, Sleepytime, green tea, green tea with lemon, green tea with lemon and honey, liver disaster, ginger with honey, ginger without honey, vanillaalmond, white truffle, blueberrychamomile, vanillawalnut, Constant Comment and Earl Grey.
Did you make some of those up?
Let me get you a blanket.
Were you just gonna bring the blanket from your bed?
Maybe we should both get under it, since we're so cold.
I don't wanna have sex with you, Pilgrim. Not right now.
It's not like I'm gonna send you home in a snowstorm or anything.
You can sleep in my bed.
And I reserve the right to change my mind about the sex later.
It's been, like, a really long time, so I think I needed this, whatever it is, so thank you.
Hey, so, can this not be a onenight stand?
For one thing, I didn't even get any.
What did you have in mind?
Come to the first round of this Battle of the Bands thing.
Oh! Wait. Can I get your number?
See you at the show, Scott Pilgrim.
This is Wallace, his roommate. Hey.
Okay, this next band is from Brampton, and they are Crash and the Boys.
Wake up, wake up, wake up!
Once we're on stage, you'll be fine.
We were just on stage for sound check, and the sound guy hated us.
Hey, Jimmy, do they rock or suck?
They have not started playing yet.
Is that girl a boy, too?
This song is called I Am So Sad, I Am So Very Very Sad.
Goes a little something like this.
All right, this next song goes out to the guy who keeps yelling from the balcony.
It's called We Hate You, Please Die.
I can feel ya, I can hear ya...
So, how do you know Scott?
It's hard for me to keep track sometimes, because he has so many friends.
Knives, how did you meet Scott?
We need to play now and loud.
So, I was on the bus with my mom...
Is that seriously the end of the story?
This next band is from Toronto.
Give it up for Sex BobOmb.

I'll take you for a ride On my garbage truck Oh, no I'll take you to the dump 'Cause you're my queen I'll take you uptown I'll show you the sites You know you wanna ride On my garbage truck Truck, truck, truck We'll pass the mansions by Drive right through the needle's eye Oh, my Oh, no... My...
My, my, my, my I've got a stereo You've just got to turn the knob And maybe we'll go As far as we can I'll be your garbage man I'll take out your junk And I'll crush it...
Well, well, well, you're quite the opponent, Pilgrim.
Who the hell are you, anyway?
And I'm Ramona's first evil exboyfriend.
Didn't you get my email explaining the situation?
You will pay for your insolence!
Hey, what's up with his outfit?
You really went out with this guy?
It was football season and for some reason, all the little jocks wanted me.
Matthew was the only nonwhite, nonjock boy in town.
So, the two of us joined forces and we took 'em all down.
We brawled and scrapped and fought for hours.
Nothing could beat Matthew's mystical powers.
After a week and a half, I told him to hit the showers.
If you want to fight me What?
You're not the brightest You won't know what hit you in the slightest This guy's good.
Me and my fireballs My Demon Hipster Chicks Tell him, Matty.
I'm talking the talk Because I know I'm slick SLick Fireballs Take this sucker down Let us show him what we're all about That doesn't even rhyme.
Open your eyes, maybe you'll see.
Well, it was nice meeting you.
Tell your gay friends I said bye.
That's not even enough for the bus home.
So, what was all that all about?
I guess if we're gonna date, you may have to defeat my seven evil exes.
And I have to fight... Defeat.
Defeat your seven evil exes if we're going to continue to date?
So, what you're saying right now is we are dating?
Does that mean we can make out?
Well, someone got to second base last night.
And someone has a second date tonight.
You know when I say "someone," I mean "me," right?
I got to second base last night.
So, I invited Ramona over for dinner tonight, so you can't be here.
I don't want you gaying up the place.
But in return, I have to issue an ultimatum.
You have to break up with Knives, that poor angel, today.
If you don't, I'm going to tell Ramona about Knives.
I didn't make up the gay rulebook.
You got a problem with it... Stop.
Take it up with Liberace's ghost.
Give me the bacon, and go do your dirt while I watch the Lucas Lee marathon.
He was this pretty good skater.
Now he's this pretty good actor.
He's filming a Winifred Hailey movie in Toronto right now.
Lucas Lee is not important to you right now. Get out.
Now, you listen close, and you listen hard, bucko.
The next click you'll hear is me hanging up.
The one after that is me pulling the trigger.
Hey, do you wanna, like, talk or whatever?
Are you wearing a tan jacket, like, a spring jacket, and a hoodie?
I can't believe TCAD's coming to town.
Will you take me to the show?
Hey, I wanted to invite you over for dinner.
I think that's a really bad idea.
My dad is nine years older than my mom.
Are you even allowed to date outside your race or whatever?
Listen, I was thinking we should break up or whatever.
Hey, check it out, I learned the bass line from Final Fantasy II.
Scott, you are the salt of the earth.
I meant scum of the earth.
Maybe soon you'll meet my newnew girlfriend.
Okay, from here on out, no girlfriends or girlfriend talk at practice.
Whether they're old, new, or Newnew.
We were lucky to survive the last round.
That's for me. That's for me.
I change my hair every week and a half, dude. Get used to it.
How do you guys all know each other?
Believe it or not, I actually dated Scott in high school.
Yeah, I know, but she did it without even making a big deal of it or anything.
God, what am I gonna do?
Can't believe you're worried about me gaying up the place.
Okay, well, I'm gonna leave you lovebirds to it.
I am heading up to Casa Loma to stalk my hetero crush.
Will you man the hell up?
You can get to second and a half base tonight.
Well, if you strike out in the next hour, come find me at the castle.
This is actually really good garlic bread.
Garlic bread is my favorite food.
I could honestly eat it for every meal.
Or just eat it all the time without even stopping.
No, why would I get fat?
I wrote a song about you.
Ramona Ramona On my mind Ramona Can't wait to hear it when it's finished.
Oh, God, I need a haircut, don't I?
I got a bad haircut right before me and my big ex broke up, but that was so long ago now I can barely remember.
Scott is acutely aware that his last salon haircut took place exactly 431 days ago, three hours before his big breakup.
He's been cutting his own hair ever since.
I mean, she told me it was mutual.
She was Nat, when I knew her, but she stopped liking that name.
But it would be cuter short, wouldn't it?
Why are you wearing that hat?
I thought we could go for a walk.
Tell me we didn't come out here in the cold so you could cover your hair with that hat.
No, no. I just love me some walking, you know.
Just putting one leg in front of the other, like this. Walking.
I just sort of feel like I'm on drugs when I'm with you.
Not that I do drugs, unless you do drugs, in which case I do drugs all the time.
Just when I'm with you, things sort of seem a little brighter.
They're shooting this movie here right now.
Did you find the guy you were stalking?
I think I'm about to right now.
I wanna have his adopted babies.
All right, on your marks, everyone.
Oh, man, we got to go.
I used to date that clown.
The only thing keeping me and her apart is the two minutes it's gonna take to kick your ass.
Actually, it might have been math.
I just remember there being a lot of drama.
He was a snotnosed little brat.
He had snot in his nose?
Hey! I'm talking to you, Scott Pilgrim.
He's famous and he talked to me.
The only thing keeping me and her apart is the two minutes it's gonna take to kick your ass.
Can I have your autograph, please?
Let's get ready to go again, please.
Let's get ready to go again.
You really think you can stand a chance against an Alister, bro?
Hey, I'm not done with you.
Sometimes I let him do the wide shots when I feel like getting blazed back in my Winnie.
I'm nothing without my stunt team.
Hey! Ask them how it feels to always get his sloppy seconds.
Hey, I'm gonna get a coffee.
Prepare to feel the wrath of the League of Evil Exes.
You really don't know about the League?
Controlling the future of Ramona's love life?
You are a pretty good actor.
I'm going for the Oscar this year.
But are you a pretty good skater?
I'm more than pretty good, ese.
I have my own skate company.
But can you do a thingy on that rail?
So, can you do a grindy thingy now?
There are, like, 200 steps, and the rails are garbage.
Well, hey, if it's too hardcore then...
You really think you can goad me into doing a trick like that?
Ah! I didn't get his autograph.
Let's move, people, the sun is coming up.
Give me a call when you get this.
Yep. You said that last night.
You know what really sucks, though?
You can't say you didn't see this coming.
What did you think these were?
Why does everything have to be so complicated?
If you want something bad, you have to fight for it.
I wasn't trying to trick you.
Hey, buddy, look, if she really is the girl of your dreams, then you have to let her know.
You have to overcome any and all obstacles that lie in your path.
You can do it. Be with her!
Plus, I need you to move out.
I'm kind of banking on her calling you back so I don't have to evict you and feel all guilty and shit.
I have a feeling that's for you, guy.
I'm not doing so good right now.
It's been different. You have no idea.
I have this totally awesome girlfriend who calls me all the time and she's America.
It's been nice chatting with you.
You may have to defeat my seven evil exes.
She's got some battle scars, dude.
You can't say you didn't see this coming.
I'm really not in the mood for this.
You punched me in the boob!
Can we not do this right now?
I'd love to postpone, darling, but I just cashed my last rain check.
I'm really, really not up for this.
But you won't see me, because next time, I'll be deadly serious next time.
What did he do this time?
What did you do this time?
Look, I'm having a meltdown or whatever.
I think I'll make it a decaf today.
What did you do with my sister?
So, what can I get you?
Is there anywhere you don't work?
They're called jobs. Something a like you wouldn't know anything about.
And by the way, I can't believe you asked Ramona out after I specifically told you not to do that.
How are you doing that with your mouth?
Never mind how I'm doing it!
What do you have to say for yourself?
Can I get a caramel macchiato?
You know what, maybe it's high time you took a look in a mirror before you wreak havoc on another girl.
And speaking of which, I hear the girl that kicked your heart in the ass is walking the streets of Toronto again.
So, I can just get my coffee over here?
Sorry that got a little crazy last night.
Listen, I know I can be hard to be around sometimes.
I totally understand if you don't want to hang out anymore.
No, no, I want to hang.
You know, the whole evil exboyfriend thing...
I know it's early, but I don't think anything can get in the way of how I...
You left me for that cocky pretty boy.
I know, you left me for someone I've never even seen.
That's so not going to happen.
Great, you're so on the list.
What happened with the two of you?
Do you mind if we don't get into it right now?
She wanted to move to Montreal, because she missed her best friend.
And two weeks later, they were sleeping together, I guess?
I can see how it sucks.
Having the past come back to haunt you.
Is it wrong that I try not to think about it?
What do you want to think about?
How warm my place is right now.
I couldn't stop thinking about my stupid exgirlfriend.
Is that the Uma Thurman movie?
Scott, just because Envy is back in town doesn't make it not over.
Right. I'm not going to let her toy with me.
From this moment on, I will think of Envy Adams no more!
Is it news that we suck, because I really don't think I can take it.
No. The Clash at Demonhead are doing a secret show tomorrow night and Envy asked us to open for them.
A gig is a gig, is a gig, is a gig.
Maybe you can put your history aside until we get through this thing, for the band.
Can't we do our own secret shows?
All our shows are secret shows.
We play the next round of the battle on Tuesday.
We have to get some buzz going.
What would you do if your ex was in a band and they wanted you to open for them?
If my ex was in a band?
Might be a little awkward, but maybe it's the grownup thing to do.
Yeah. We're all adults here, right?
He's dating a fatass hipster chick!
He only likes her because she's old.
She's just some fatass white girl, you know?
I think you mentioned she was fat.
I mean, I didn't even know there was good music until two months ago!
When I got this idea, I just thought, "I have to do it!" I can't hear anything you're saying.
Oh, God! I look so good.
But I know how to get him back.
Come on, come on Thank you, we were Sex BobOmb.
We have some merch at the back, so...
Look who Knives is hanging out with.
And then it was time for Toronto to drown in the sweet sorrow of The Clash at Demonhead!

Hello, again, friend of a friend I knew you well Our common goal was waiting for the world to end Now that the truth is just a rule that you demand You crack the whip Shapeshift and trick the past again Send you my love on the wire Lift you up, every time Everyone pulls away from you That was...
Yeah, you should see them live.
I think I'm gonna throw up.
I can't even believe I'm saying this, but Envy Adams would like you all to come backstage.
Wait, how do you know Envy?
I think we should get out of here.
You guys play with the Pixies?
Yeah, it's not really something I can put into words.
You guys make a cute couple, you know?
Envy, I was just gonna say did you get those jeans in New York?
I'm talking to Ramona right now.
Played the Chaos Theatre, for Gideon.
I've kissed the lips that kissed you!
I'm not afraid to hit a girl.
You punched the highlights out of her hair.
He punched the highlights out of her hair!
I don't know the meaning of the word.
So, you guys doing anything fun while you're in town?
You'll pay for your crimes against humanity.
It's not really that big of a deal.
I partake not in the meat, nor the breast milk, nor the ovum of any creature with a face.
Short answer, being vegan just makes you better than most people.
I always wondered, how does not eating dairy products give you psychic powers?
You know how you only use 10% of your brain?
That's because the other 90% is filled with curds and whey.
Did you learn that at Vegan Academy?
Go ahead and get snippy, baby.
If you knew the science, maybe I'd listen to a word you're saying.
If I peed my pants, would you pretend I just got wet from the rain?
Then why don't you give me the Cliff Notes on how and why you ended up dating this Ahole.
Is that really important right now?
Well, if there's a key element in his backstory that's gonna help me out in a critical moment of not dying, yes.
I was only dating Lucas until the minute Todd walked by.
Guess that's not very nice, but I used to be, kind of like that.
He punched a hole in the moon for me.
A week and a half later he told me his dad was sending him to Vegan Academy, so I dumped him.
Have you dumped everyone you've ever been with?
Look, I've dabbled in being a bitch.
It's part of the reason I moved here.
I was really hoping to just leave it all behind me.
We have unfinished business, I and he.
Don't you talk to me about grammar.
Tell it to the cleaning lady on Monday.
Because you'll be dust by Monday.
Because you'll be pulverized in two seconds.
And the cleaning lady, she cleans up dust.
She has the weekends off, so...
Basically, you can't win this fight.
You're gonna have to give up this girl, because Todd's gonna kill you.
You used to be so nice!
Scott, we're gonna go to Pizza Pizza for a slice.
Sounds like someone wants to get funky.
Your will is broken. You're through.
What say we drink to my memory?
Fair trade blend with soy milk?
Dude, I can see in your mind's eye.
You put halfandhalf into one of those coffees in an attempt to make me break vegan edge.
I'll take the one with soy.
Actually, muchacho, I poured the soy in this cup.
But I thought real hard about pouring it in that cup.
You know, in my mind's eye or whatever.
Todd Ingram, you're under arrest for veganity violation, code number 827, imbibement of halfandhalf.
No vegan diet, no vegan powers!
But it's only my first offense.
At 12:27 a.m. on February 1 st, you knowingly ingested gelato.
On April 4th, 7:30 p.m., you partook a plate of chicken parmesan.
You once were a vegone, but now you will be gone.
You just headbutted my boyfriend so hard he burst.
You kicked my heart in the ass, so I guess we're even.
Natalie? No one calls me that anymore.
For the record, I am so pissed off for you, right now.
We're still going to the afterparty, right?
I'm not sure there's going to be much of a party.
I think a third of the band just went "poom." Yeah, cool bands never go to their own afterparties.
Just the desperate people trying to rub elbows with the label guys.
Well, I kind of almost died back there.
I'm not saying I want to go.
I'll do whatever you want to do.
We really don't have to go to this thing.
It'll probably be a bad scene all around.
Have you ever dated someone that wasn't a total ass?
